body.name: Anmerl Inflatable Travel Pillow Soft Velvet Portable Neck Pillow with Storage Bag for Airplane Train Car Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 10 mins
features: Pefect for Travel: Still complaining about discomfort on long flights? Anmerl Travel Neck Pillow is a simple and comfortable travel essential, ergonomically designed, lightweight and portable, simple and easy to use, making traveling easier and more comfortable.

Excellent Quality: The travel pillow insert is made of eco-friendly PVC material, which has the properties of soft, durable and elastic. The pillow cover is made of velvet fabric, soft, breathable, skin-friendly, odorless, removable and washable, suitable for all seasons.

Easy to Use & Free Adjustment: In order to make it more convenient for you to use it, we use a large diameter inflatable valve with non-return valve, you only need to blow 3 times to fill it up, and the non-return valve ensures that there will be no air leakage. Pressing the inflation valve will empty the gas in 5 seconds. You can freely adjust the inflation volume to control the level of support to ensure optimal comfort.

Lightweight Portable Travel Essentials: This travel inflatable pillow solves the hassle of carrying a bulky and heavy memory foam neck pillow while traveling, it is smaller and lighter, comes with a portable storage bag and takes up very little space. Easy and simple to use, providing great comfort, it is an essential must-have on your travel list.

Multi-Purpose: This portable inflatable neck pillow is not only used in traveling, you can also fully use it in your life and work. It will serve as a small pillow for you to support your head and relieve your neck pressure and fatigue when you are resting on a recliner at home or on the patio. It is also great for providing back and neck support when you are in the office or in the car.
body.description: Inflatable Neck Pillow Advantages Small size and light weight to carry around. Folding Size: 5.9 x 4.8 inches, save space.Inflatable neck pillow has high elasticity and better support. Inflatable volume can be freely adjusted.Comfortable and breathable, not stuffy, suitable for any season.Simple structure, easy to disassemble and wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: Great for travel, small when not inflated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Totally worth it! So easy to inflate and the valve stays plugged. Comfy enough for me. I was shocked at how great it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: De lo mejor, excepto porque el pequeño broche delantero se rompió al usarlo por primera vez. Por lo demás: delicioso.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked as planned
reviews.reviewText: A decent quality plush fabric outer. A good blow up valve. It was worth the price. Decent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my wife to use on our recent trip to Europe. She used it going and coming. For the money, this is a winner. Soft, well-shaped, held up well and includes a nice carrying pouch. It also includes an eye shade and ear plugs. This pillow compared very favorably to mine, which costs quite a bit more. A great deal for ten bucks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, Those Bumps really work, Good Deal
reviews.reviewText: UPDATED REVIEW 12/19/23+1 Star to 5. After travelling with this pillow and another one with a built-in air pump, I'll choose compactness over bulkiness anytime. I was originally concerned with hygiene of blowing it up. My handed me some alcohol wipes for before and after use. Case closed.ORIGINAL REVIEWA very nice travel pillow.1. The weird looking support bumps actually work! No more neck kinks.2. The pillow case is very soft, removable and I think washable!3. I confirmed it takes only 3 puff’s of air to inflate the pillow. That said, the valve is very large, but it doesn’t pull up to accommodate your mouth. You have to almost feel like taking a bite out your pillow! Very awkward! (-1 star) It would have been nice if they provided a tapered straw/pipe to inflate/deflate for hygienic reasons. It’s easier to wipe down a straw than to wipe down the valve assembly.4. It’s nice they provided the blindfold and ear plugs. I’d gladly trade these 2 items for a hygienic straw/pipe.At the $10 price point, it’s a good deal. The true test comes next month when I’ll be flying. Stay tuned…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Easy to inflate and holds air well. The hole to blow air into is very large, so kind of awkward to blow into, but it blows up quickly. The cover is very soft but not annoyingly velvety. Low odor. I feel nice and supported when I wear it. I'm plus size, but it fits comfortably around my neck and snaps with no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was great but once I brought it on the plane it was supper uncomfortable. Easy to assemble but was to tight. I thought maybe next time I will try to remove some of the air.

Die richtige Größe und ein geniales Ventil. Nur 4 mal pusten reichen aus um das Kissen zu füllen und per Knopfdruck kann es schnell entleert werden. Und das beste ist dass es leicht ist und klein verstaut werden kann. Bei einem flug ist leichtes Gepäck wichtig.

Vraiment pratique 👍 Se gonfle et dégonfle rapidement. Le maintien est bon, même si après 6 heures de train on n'a qu’une hâte c'est de retrouver son oreiller. Mais je le répète, pour les "grands voyageurs", je pense que c’est un must-have. Happy travel 😊

Ci viene consegnato in busta sigillata, contenuto in un pratico sacchetto dello stesso materiale del cuscino, tipo tessuto vellutato piuttosto robusto, assieme ad una mascherina nera per gli occhi, molto semplice, e dei tappi per orecchie.Mi soffermo sul cuscino perché é lui l'oggetto di interesse: Il materiale mi sembra buono, resistente a sufficienza, magari da foderare in estate con qualcosa in cotone di piú fresco, ma ci sta.La parte gonfiabile in gomma solida si estrae con facilitá per il lavaggio della fodera, per il gonfiaggio usa intelligentemente una valvola senza ritorno in modo da rendere immediato e semplice il gonfiaggio, non ci sono problemi di perdita d'aria e indossato mi risulta comodo. Ha anche una chiusura anteriore per una miglior tenuta in posizione del cuscino.E' un prodotto ben pensato e ben fatto con buoni materiali e ad un prezzo davvero ottimo.Consigliato.

E' comodo e utile per un pisolino quando non si ha a disposizione un letto ma soltanto una poltrona.In viaggio è un accessorio da portare con se soprattutto in aereo o treno, perette di appoggiare la testa lateralmente senza farsi venire un torcicollo.è in morbido velluto ed all'interno c'è la camera d'aria che si può gonfiare tranquillamente a bocca.Avrei gradito una chiusura con il velcro nell'apertura dato che altrimenti rimane aperta.Le cuciture non sono proprio perfette ma comunque la forma è corretta.Utile la clips per chiuderlo attorno al collo rendendolo più confortevole durante il sonno. A corredo sono forniti due tappi per le orecchie ed una mascherina per dormire ed una sacca nella quale riporre il cuscino.
